Class DigiBankAccount

java.lang.Object
DigiBankAccount
public class DigiBankAccount extends Object
Allows creation of a bank account with unique accountNumber. Can store accountName, balance and transactionHistory. Has methods to deposit and withdraw funds from the account. Has methods to displayBalance and displayTransactionHistory/

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    deposit()
    Handles edge case where user keys in no arguments to deposit method.
    void
    deposit(double depositAmount)
    Checks depositAmount for negative or zero values and checks if reached maximum limit of 5 valid transactions, before recording as valid transaction in transactionHistory, incrementing balance and incrementing transactionCount.
    void
    displayBalance()
    Displays balance of the account
    void
    displayTransactionHistory()
    Displays accountName, accountNumber, balance and transactionHistory of the account.
    int
    getNumberOfAccounts()
    Returns numberOfAccounts value.
    void
    withdraw()
    Handles edge case where user keys in no arguments to withdraw method.
    void
    withdraw(double withdrawAmount)
    Checks withdrawAmount for negative or zero values, checks if reached maximum limit of 5 valid transactions, checks enough balance for withdrawal before recording as valid transaction in transactionHistory, incrementing balance and incrementing transactionCount.

  • Constructor Details

    • DigiBankAccount

      public DigiBankAccount(String accountHolder)
      Class Constructor to initialise accountName, accountNumber, balance, transactionHistory and transactionCount
      Parameters:
      accountHolder - the name of the account

  • Method Details

    • deposit

      public void deposit()
      Handles edge case where user keys in no arguments to deposit method.

    • deposit

      public void deposit(double depositAmount)
      Checks depositAmount for negative or zero values and checks if reached maximum limit of 5 valid transactions, before recording as valid transaction in transactionHistory, incrementing balance and incrementing transactionCount.
      Parameters:
      depositAmount - the deposit amount to the account

    • withdraw

      public void withdraw()
      Handles edge case where user keys in no arguments to withdraw method.

    • withdraw

      public void withdraw(double withdrawAmount)
      Checks withdrawAmount for negative or zero values, checks if reached maximum limit of 5 valid transactions, checks enough balance for withdrawal before recording as valid transaction in transactionHistory, incrementing balance and incrementing transactionCount.
      Parameters:
      withdrawAmount - the withdraw amount from the account

    • getNumberOfAccounts

      public int getNumberOfAccounts()
      Returns numberOfAccounts value.
      Returns:
      this.numberOfAccounts the counter to keep track of number of instances of object that has been created.

    • displayBalance

      public void displayBalance()
      Displays balance of the account

    • displayTransactionHistory

      public void displayTransactionHistory()
      Displays accountName, accountNumber, balance and transactionHistory of the account.
